title: How to do Amazon Keyword Research With Helium 10 | Full Beginner Tutorial 2025
description:
If you're new to Amazon FBA and wondering how to find profitable keywords for your Amazon listing and PPC campaigns, this video is for you!

In this step-by-step beginner tutorial, I’ll walk you through exactly how to use Helium 10’s Magnet and Cerebro tools to build your keyword list — even if you’ve never done keyword research before.

Learn how to:
-Use Magnet tool to find high-volume, relevant keywords
-Use Cerebro reverse ASIN lookup to spy on competitor keywords
-Filter out low-performing or irrelevant keywords
-Build a targeted keyword list for your Amazon product listing
-Export your keyword list into ChatGPT to optimize your SEO copy
-Save time as a busy mom using Helium 10’s all-in-one keyword tool

📦 Whether you're just launching your first product or trying to improve your Amazon SEO and PPC strategy, this tutorial will help you rank faster and sell smarter.

📺 WATCH NEXT:
➡️ How to Sell on Amazon FBA for Beginners – Full Tutorial: https://youtu.be/O0tjklPsvjQ
➡️ How to Do
tags: how to find keywords for amazon
